channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are We Witnessing The Birth Of Machine Psychology?
item.description: AI therapists are rising fast. From parasocial bonds to clinical breakthroughs, explore how tech is reshaping mental health and the dangers and risks ...

item.title: Xbox Backtracks On $80 Games Like ‘Outer Worlds,’ Is ‘Black Ops 7’ Next?
item.description: Microsoft announces The Outer Worlds 2 will no longer cost $80, raising questions about what Black Ops 7 might cost.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four’ Just Hit A Very Funny Rotten Tomatoes Milestone
item.description: Fantastic Four is reviewing well, but in the context of superhero movie history, it has achieved a rather hilarious milestone on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Just Secretly Fixed A Big ‘Edge Of Fate’ Problem
item.description: Destiny 2 launched with a big problem regarding its new Portal system, but it has now quietly offered a fix that is very useful.

item.title: Netflix Says ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Just Made History With A New Record
item.description: Netflix has announced that KPop Demon Hunters has done something that no other movie has ever done on the service before.

item.title: Seeing the lottery
item.description: At least the Powerball tells the truth. In a state run lottery, the deal is very simple: You pay your money, you take your chances. The government ran...

item.title: Casual cruelty
item.description: Is it okay to dress your cat in a ridiculous costume? What about giving a poodle a haircut that subjects him to ridicule? The cat and the dog probably...

item.title: Resilience is a practice
item.description: It’s easy to imagine that we should do our work and then, when it doesn’t work as we hope, improvise to fix it. But perhaps our work is to show up rea...

item.title: Lunging
item.description: A useful metaphor from juggling: When you find yourself lunging for a ball or club, let it drop. Lunging will always lead to a drop sooner or later, a...

item.title: Finding the difficult work
item.description: It’s tempting to seek out the easy gigs and the straightforward projects. But of course, if they’re the easy ones, there’s probably quite a few people...
